Articles.Content:
14 minutes ago, Lambuck said:

@nightingale  Thanks.  I had tried to target the Mun/Minmus, Set as no target, etc.  Setting to active vessel met the requirement thanks!

 

 

 

No problem.  I may need to revise that requirement so that seeing a dish to mun is sufficient.

that "active vessel" seems to be the problem. I had the moons as a target and that was making the contracts fail.

Edited July 31, 2016 by KaiserSoze

New release here, mostly a cosmetic update - but a very pretty one!  Special thanks to @rough93 for letting me use his logo!

ContractPack-RemoteTech 2.1.3

  • New logo (thanks rough93).
  • Added loading tip.

Hey there! Love your mod, definite must have! That said, I'm having a bit of a problem with the contracts, and them not showing up? I had 2.1.3 on my last save, and everyhting was perfect, but, I just restarted a new career game, and done ~15 contracts or so, and still no remotetech contracts....

Also, Contract configurator does not show any listing of the contract pack even being installed, despite it showing in CKAN, and double verified that it did install the Remotetech folder in ContractPacks. The install of it was not altered at all between this career and my previous one.

So...is there something I've missed, or a hidden pre-requisite to get these contracts to popup?

Edited August 22, 2016 by DracoSilverpath

6 hours ago, DracoSilverpath said:

Hey there! Love your mod, definite must have! That said, I'm having a bit of a problem with the contracts, and them not showing up? I had 2.1.3 on my last save, and everyhting was perfect, but, I just restarted a new career game, and done ~15 contracts or so, and still no remotetech contracts....

Also, Contract configurator does not show any listing of the contract pack even being installed, despite it showing in CKAN, and double verified that it did install the Remotetech folder in ContractPacks. The install of it was not altered at all between this career and my previous one.

So...is there something I've missed, or a hidden pre-requisite to get these contracts to popup?

Toss a KSP.log file my way and I'll take a look.  The only dependencies are Contract Configurator and RemoteTech, so as long as you have the latest of those, it should be okay..

Hi guys,

 

There something I don't understand : the Mûn network contract won't become available because I have one condition unmet : "Must have a Remote Tech constellation orbiting Kerbin with an active disj (or omni antenna) with a range of at least 12,000 km".

But I've got 4 satellites in Kerbin GSO (Kerbin network contract for 4 sats), all of them have 2 DTS-M1 pointing toward the Mûn and Minmus (so that's much more than 12,000 km ?). What I've got wrong ?

12 minutes ago, Cassin said:

Hi guys,

 

There something I don't understand : the Mûn network contract won't become available because I have one condition unmet : "Must have a Remote Tech constellation orbiting Kerbin with an active disj (or omni antenna) with a range of at least 12,000 km".

But I've got 4 satellites in Kerbin GSO (Kerbin network contract for 4 sats), all of them have 2 DTS-M1 pointing toward the Mûn and Minmus (so that's much more than 12,000 km ?). What I've got wrong ?

I probably need to rework that one to make it more clear (or just less strict) - it needs to have that antenna set to "Active Vessel".

Oh ! Allright, that's much clear now !

 

Thanks

On 8/25/2016 at 7:09 PM, nightingale said:

I probably need to rework that one to make it more clear (or just less strict) - it needs to have that antenna set to "Active Vessel".

Could you possibly make it so that the pre-requisite for the Mun contract is to have the Antenna set as Active Vessel and/or Mun and the Minmum contract to have Active Vessel and/or Minmus?

This issue just had me stumped for around 30 minutes before I realised why I wasn't being offered the contracts.

So After i did my Mun contract i tried to do the Minmus one, but cant accept it,



 

This is my network




i even tried to diable my network



But i still cant take it what do i need to do?

EDIT: Yup, there's too many old threads in google, I was looking at the old one.  Next release will have RemoteTech support.

@nightingale Hey, having the same issue persist  that Taxoz had with the contracts for some reason... They all show that I can't do them anymore. I only built a 3 satellite network! Is it because the time limit has expired?
@SeaPear - can you provide a screen shot of what you're seeing?

@nightingale Thanks for taking a look, yeah that's odd, just double checked the folder and all the .cfg's are missing. Got a feeling ckan is the issue, removed it, but then couldn't see it in ckan even with incompatible or all selected. Just manually installed from github and its now showing missions.

However its saying none have conditions met, all showing I don't have antenna or power, despite being most of the way through the tech tree and having many Kerbin Comms sats up.

On 13/11/2016 at 2:01 AM, Torih said:

I've also noticed CC is thowing an exception on every game load:

ContractConfigurator.ExpressionParser.PartParser.ParseIdentifier

I fixed this while ago, and asked for testing, but nobody has bothered to confirm it's actually fixed so haven't released. Try the pre-release here and please let me know on the B&S thread if that fixes it for you.

I fixed this while ago, and asked for testing, but nobody has bothered to confirm it's actually fixed so haven't released. Try the pre-release here and please let me know on the B&S thread if that fixes it for you.

That's sorted it thanks, wasn't aware it was caused by your mod so didn't know you had a version to test.

Using RemoteTech 1.8.1, contracts aren't spawning. CC lists all requirements met, except part Power or Antenna. That bit is yellow in debug menu. I have all relevant antennas and power parts unlocked, so I should have contracts.

Here's logs and screens, if you need more let me know.

On 11/20/2016 at 7:41 PM, symmeclept said:

Using RemoteTech 1.8.1, contracts aren't spawning. CC lists all requirements met, except part Power or Antenna. That bit is yellow in debug menu. I have all relevant antennas and power parts unlocked, so I should have contracts.

Here's logs and screens, if you need more let me know.

Can confirm, experiencing same problem: Remotetech, Contract Configurator, Mod Manager and ContractPack Remotetech all installed via CKAN to most up to date and having same problem.

1 hour ago, feldomatic said:

Can confirm, experiencing same problem: Remotetech, Contract Configurator, Mod Manager and ContractPack Remotetech all installed via CKAN to most up to date and having same problem.  

I downgraded to RT 1.8.0 and everything works perfectly. Just copy over the antenna configs from 1.8.1 if you want to use the new stock relay parts. Seems a simple solution until things get patched.
